answers.answer: Insist on answers. That's all i can think of. :/

Just try to sit back, relax, and breathe. Everything will work out. Baby sounds healthy, like you said just stubborn. Definitly be straight forward with your doc about how you feel to and make sure there understanding any concerns you have and are taking them seriously. And as for all the other stuff.... just breathe momma, it'll work out!! Focus on positive things and try to do things to calm down like just watch a movie or take a drive, whatever calms you. Good luck!! And just take deep breaths!!!
Wow, why would they write   protein in your urine as OK. Dr's are a joke sometimes.

If you have vision changes with migraines, that's not a good thing but I don't know what it indicates. My doc office said if I even get those at the same time to go in. Otherwise the other symptoms seem like end of pregnancy regular stuff. Maybe get a second opinion from another doc in the same office? But if your monitoring is showing everything as fine then I really don't know. But SamN is right, just try to breathe and relax as much as possible.
Protein in urine and horrible headaches: symptoms of preeclampsia. Insist on preeclampsia test. Are you also having nausea and excessive swelling? Could be preeclampsia...

question: had appt today getting very tired every time I go to doc they want to send me to the hospital for fetal monitoring bc decreased movements n when I get over n get monitored everything is ok .today I had a biophysical profile done n was 8/8 such waste of time I already know she just stubborn. I'm just ready for her to come already I've lost my mucus plug over a week ago m only dialated 2cm and can barely walk. I've bn having a lot of irregular contractions n super exhausted ! I no longer sleep at night I'm always up with restless leg n insomnia n all docs say is take tylenol yada yada. Bn having bad migrains n seeing flashing lights with protein n my urine n docs r just saying its stress.im getting anxious n concerned bc I don't want anything to happen during labor n my ob just writing everything off lk it's ok. Anyone suggestions????
title: 38weeks n frustrated !!
